heading: Core Services
intro: Pick the problem—I'll recommend the best delivery (1:1 coaching, workshop, or a short consulting project).

items.title: Feedback & Insights
items.desc: Employee pulse interviews, surveys, and culture checks to identify challenges and opportunities.

items.title: Leadership Development
items.desc: New-manager training, senior leadership coaching, succession support.

items.title: Early Career Support
items.desc: Onboarding programs, new-grad training, and career coaching.

items.title: Communication Skills
items.desc: Cross-cultural teamwork, conflict resolution, and public speaking.

items.title: International Culture
items.desc: Understand global workplace norms; build confidence in international settings.

items.title: Global Business English
items.desc: Practical coaching for presentations, meetings, and working abroad.

items.title: HR Process Consulting
items.desc: Recruitment strategy, onboarding design, retention & engagement.

deliveryNote: Delivery: 1:1 coaching, workshops, or short consulting projects—recommended to fit your needs.
